name: Branching Out (williamdual, alexstef, GatesStudios, SakuraDemon)
description:
-Our submission for GGJ23

-A relaxing game where you lay down your roots by creating an interwoven ecosystem with many animal friends.

-Click the one of the three elements in your basket, then place it in your ecosystem, the flora and fauna can only reach their full potential if you place them in synergy with other elements (ex: a tree needs water to grow).
